description: Defines a Flutter widget 'NoteCard' that displays note details such as title, content preview, timestamp, and action buttons for editing and deleting. It uses theming and layout widgets to create a styled card component for a note-taking app.

classes.name: NoteCard
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that visually represents a note with title, preview, timestamp, and action icons.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the visual representation of the NoteCard widget, incorporating styling, layout, and interaction.
